text: Daniel Chiriac (born June 8, 1973 in Constanța) is a former Romanian rugby union player. He played as a lock. ==Club career== During his career, Chiriac played for RCJ Farul Constanța in Romania with whom he played in European competitions.Rugby: Legende ale Farului, din nou pe gazon, la 20 de ani de la cucerirea ultimului titlu de campioană a României (galerie foto+video) ==International career== Chiriac received five caps for Romania, from his debut in 1999 against Scotland to his last game in 2001 against Netherlands. He was a member of the national side for the 5th Rugby World Cup in 1999, where he played three matches in the East Group against Australia, USA and Ireland. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian rugby union players Category:Romania international rugby union players Category:Rugby union locks Category:Farul Constanța (rugby) players Category:People from Constanța
title: Daniel Chiriac
